requirement: The system shall search for available recycled parts for the supplied vehicle parts and suppliers.

The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.

The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students, which will include (but not be limited to) student name, student ID, admission date, classes, credits, GPA, and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.
The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.
The system will display a blank set of ratings if there are not ratings yet defined.
The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.

The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical labs, which will include (but not be limited to) class name, class number, lab section, listing of students enrolled, instructor, day(s), time, and location.
When the hit results in sinking a ship, the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.
The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.
The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid
The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.
The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.
The system shall validate user credentials before granting access.
